Name: Samrómur
Description: This corpus contains validated speech-recordings and is a result of a crowd-sourcing effort run by the Language and Voice Lab at Reykjavik University in cooperation with Almannarómur, Center for Language Technology. The corpus contains recordings by 8,392 different speakers, with the average recording lenth being 5.2 seconds. Transcriptions of the read texts are also available. The corpus is available for download from the CLARIN.IS repository.
Group: Corpora with transcriptions and audio recordings
